name: places/ChIJZyaEibpZwokRiAYrml1L2Hc
adrFormatAddress: 292 8th Ave, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: Was a bit skeptical given the reviews but I was a fan! The team is super responsive and did a great job cleaning my laundry. Well priced and free delivery / pick up. Would highly recommend.

text.text: Was a bit skeptical given the reviews but I was a fan! The team is super responsive and did a great job cleaning my laundry. Well priced and free delivery / pick up. Would highly recommend.

originalText.text: I’ve been going to this dry cleaner for years due to convenience and because the people there have been kind to me. I’ve had lots of subpar dry cleaning done here, but they are willing to take back an item if you’re not satisfied so that’s made it somewhat okay. But after a recent alteration where they blatantly did not follow instructions, they just brushed it off like they didn’t cut off 3 inches of an expensive dress that I did not want cut off. I asked them to alter it one more time in an attempt to fix it, and after we agreed that they would do it for free, they had the audacity to ask me to pay when I went to go pick it up, and then they claimed that the seamstress didn’t make the wrong alteration and that she didn’t even remember working on my dress... I even had photo evidence of what my dress used to look like, and they still played dumb. I was upset the first time around, but lying to me and demanding that I pay for their mistake was the last straw. I’m sorry to write this review, but I’m never going back to this place again.

originalText.text: Horrible place - Agree with the comments below. Zero customer service. They lost an article of clothing of mine (because there was a ticket with proof, they lied and said it was returned). I argued that then their delivery guy must have dropped it on the way from the store. They do not apolgize and take 0 responsibility for any of their mistakes. Avoid.

text.text: Horrible place - Agree with the comments below. Zero customer service. They lost an article of clothing of mine (because there was a ticket with proof, they lied and said it was returned). I argued that then their delivery guy must have dropped it on the way from the store. They do not apolgize and take 0 responsibility for any of their mistakes. Avoid.

originalText.text: Worst Dry Cleaner in Manhattan! Lost TWO items on me: a very expensive pair of pants (first time I dry cleaned them). I gave them another chance and then they lost another pair of pants. There explanation was "laundry is complicated".  Do yourself a favor and walk another block and go to another dry cleaner!!

There explanation was "laundry is complicated".  Do yourself a favor and walk another block and go to another dry cleaner!!

originalText.text: This place ruined a whole load of my laundry, my clothes were in shreds and had holes. When I confronted them they told me I took shears to my own clothes. Horrible service.

text.text: This place ruined a whole load of my laundry, my clothes were in shreds and had holes. When I confronted them they told me I took shears to my own clothes. Horrible service.
